title: Hansel and Gretel
subtle:
Fairy Tale (fiction), 1,374 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 700L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     O and R
description: Hansel and Gretel is a retelling of the classic German fairy tale in which a brother and sister find themselves held captive by a deceitful and wicked old woman. Will the clever pair of siblings be able to escape before the old woman's unsavory plan can unfold? The book can be used to teach students how to make inferences and draw conclusions and to understand the use of quotations in dialogue. The book and lesson are also available for levels O and R.
meta: envied, furtively, gemstones, loathsome, quaint, seized, snarled, stepmother, swooning, treasure, trudged, wicked
Make Inferences/Draw Conclusions : Make inferences and draw conclusions
Quotation Marks : Recognize and use quotation marks
Synonyms and Antonyms : Identify and use synonyms and antonyms
